title: GreenLeaf Animated E-commerce Plant Store Frontend

requirements.summary: Create animated hero section with cinematic plant visuals and smooth animations
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section takes up full viewport height
Plant/leaf images have continuous floating animation
Text elements fade in and slide up on page load
Background gradient subtly shifts colors
Animated scroll indicator prompts user to scroll down

file_operations.description: Create Home page component with full-screen hero section. Implement floating animation for plant images using CSS keyframes and transforms. Add fade-in and slide-up animations for text elements with staggered delays. Include animated background gradient using CSS gradients with subtle color shifts. Add scroll indicator with bouncing animation. Reference generated images: frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-plants.dim_1920x1080.png for hero background and frontend/public/assets/generated/monstera-float.dim_400x400.png for floating leaf element.

Create reusable HeroSection component with props for background image, floating elements, and text content. Implement animation logic using Framer Motion or CSS animations for smooth transitions. Handle responsive behavior for mobile and tablet viewports.

Add global CSS keyframe animations for floating, fade-in, slide-up, and gradient shift effects. Define animation durations and easing functions for smooth, organic motion. Ensure animations respect prefers-reduced-motion for accessibility.

requirements.summary: Add featured categories section with hover animations
acceptanceCriteria: Category cards have subtle lift transform on hover
Images zoom smoothly when hovered
Shadow expands softly around hovered cards
Button hover states are liquid smooth with no jarring transitions

file_operations.description: Add FeaturedCategories section to Home page below hero. Include category cards with hover effects.

Create CategoryCard component with hover animations. Implement lift transform (translateY), image zoom scale, and shadow expansion using CSS transitions. Add smooth button hover states with easing curves. Ensure hover states work on touch devices with appropriate fallbacks.
Create static category data with category names, descriptions, and image references for featured categories (e.g., Succulents, Tropical Plants, Low-Light Plants, Pet-Friendly).

requirements.summary: Implement best-selling plants carousel with smooth sliding transitions
acceptanceCriteria: Carousel slides smoothly between products
Previous/next navigation controls work correctly
Carousel is touch-enabled on mobile devices
Auto-play option works with smooth transitions

file_operations.description: Add BestSellersCarousel section to Home page. Pass best-selling products from static data.

Create ProductCarousel component with smooth slide transitions using transform and translateX. Implement previous/next navigation buttons. Add touch swipe support for mobile using touch event handlers. Include auto-play functionality with configurable interval. Add pagination dots for visual navigation feedback.
Create custom hook to manage carousel state including current slide index, auto-play timer, touch gesture handling, and navigation logic. Return carousel controls and state for component use.

requirements.summary: Create benefits section with scroll-triggered animated icons
acceptanceCriteria: Icons animate when scrolled into viewport
Animations are smooth and purposeful
Benefits are displayed in a clean grid layout
Text appears with staggered timing after icons

file_operations.description: Add BenefitsSection to Home page with scroll-triggered animations.

Create BenefitsSection component with grid layout for benefits. Use Intersection Observer to trigger animations when section enters viewport. Reference generated icons: frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-eco.dim_64x64.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-shipping.dim_64x64.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-care-guide.dim_64x64.png for benefit icons. Implement staggered text animations following icon animations.
Create custom hook using Intersection Observer API to detect when elements enter viewport. Return boolean state for triggering CSS animations or Framer Motion variants.

requirements.summary: Add testimonials section with automatic sliding carousel
acceptanceCriteria: Testimonials auto-slide at regular intervals
Sliding animation is smooth and seamless
Users can manually navigate testimonials
Pause on hover functionality works

file_operations.description: Add TestimonialsSection to Home page with automatic carousel.

Create TestimonialsCarousel component with auto-slide functionality. Implement smooth slide transitions with transform animations. Add manual navigation controls. Include pause-on-hover behavior using mouse event handlers. Reuse carousel logic from useCarousel hook.
Create static testimonials data with customer names, quotes, ratings, and optional avatar placeholders.

requirements.summary: Create newsletter signup section with soft motion effects
acceptanceCriteria: Input field has smooth focus transitions
Submit button has hover animation
Section has subtle entrance animation on scroll
Form elements have elegant motion design

file_operations.description: Add NewsletterSection to Home page with scroll-triggered entrance animation.

Create NewsletterSection component with email input and submit button. Implement smooth focus transitions on input using CSS transitions. Add button hover animation with glow or scale effect. Use useScrollAnimation hook for section entrance animation. Handle form submission with visual feedback (success/error states).

requirements.summary: Build shop page with animated product grid revealing on scroll
acceptanceCriteria: Products fade in and slide up when scrolled into view
Grid items animate with staggered delays for cascade effect
Animation triggers only once per scroll session
Grid is responsive across all screen sizes

file_operations.description: Create Shop page with product grid layout. Import static product data and render ProductCard components. Implement scroll-triggered animations using Intersection Observer for fade-in and slide-up effects. Apply staggered animation delays based on grid index for cascade effect. Ensure responsive grid with appropriate breakpoints (1 column mobile, 2-3 tablet, 3-4 desktop).

Create ProductCard component displaying product image, name, price, and quick action buttons. Implement hover effects (lift, zoom, shadow expansion). Include scroll animation classes that trigger via Intersection Observer. Reference generated product images for visual display.

Create static product data array with 12-15 example plants. Include properties: id, name, description, price, image path (referencing frontend/public/assets/generated/succulent-1.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/fiddle-leaf.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/snake-plant.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/pothos.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/peace-lily.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/rubber-plant.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/zz-plant.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/calathea.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/bird-paradise.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/string-pearls.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/aloe-vera.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/boston-fern.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/cactus-mix.dim_400x400.png), category, waterLevel (low/medium/high), sunlightLevel (low/medium/bright), inStock boolean.

requirements.summary: Add filter sidebar with sliding interaction and animated filter selection
acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar slides in/out smoothly
Filter options highlight smoothly when selected
Selected filters show active state with animation
Mobile filter menu works with drawer animation

file_operations.description: Add FilterSidebar component to Shop page. Implement toggle button for mobile filter drawer. Pass filter state and handlers to ProductGrid for filtering logic.

Create FilterSidebar component with category, price range, care level (water/sunlight), and availability filters. Implement smooth slide-in/out animation using transform translateX or CSS transitions. Add animated selection states with smooth highlight transitions. On mobile, render as drawer that slides from side. Manage filter state and communicate changes to parent component.

Create custom hook to manage filter state including selected categories, price range, care levels, and availability. Provide functions to apply filters to product array and return filtered results. Handle filter reset functionality.

requirements.summary: Implement hover preview effects on product cards
acceptanceCriteria: Product images zoom on hover
Shadow smoothly expands around card
Quick info appears on hover
Hover state is smooth and performant

file_operations.description: Add hover state management to ProductCard. Implement image zoom using CSS transform scale on image container. Add shadow expansion using box-shadow transition. Display quick info overlay (Add to Cart, Wishlist buttons) with fade-in animation on hover. Optimize for 60fps performance using CSS transforms and will-change property.

requirements.summary: Add smooth pagination transitions between product pages
acceptanceCriteria: Page changes have fade or slide transition
Active page number is highlighted
Pagination controls are keyboard accessible
Transition feels seamless without jarring refresh

file_operations.description: Add Pagination component below product grid. Implement page state management and pass to ProductGrid for displaying correct products.

Create Pagination component with page number buttons, previous/next controls, and active state highlighting. Implement smooth fade or slide transition when changing pages using CSS transitions or Framer Motion. Ensure keyboard accessibility with proper ARIA labels and focus management. Add smooth scroll-to-top behavior on page change.
Create custom hook to manage pagination state including current page, items per page, and total pages calculation. Return paginated data slice and page navigation functions.

requirements.summary: Create product detail page with image gallery, animated care indicators, accordion sections, and related products
acceptanceCriteria: Image gallery transitions smoothly between photos
Thumbnail navigation works with smooth selection
Care indicator icons animate on page load or scroll
Accordion sections expand/collapse smoothly
Related products carousel slides smoothly

file_operations.description: Create ProductDetail page component that receives product ID from route params. Display product information including ImageGallery, product details, animated care indicators (referencing frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-water.dim_64x64.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-sun.dim_64x64.png), price, and add-to-cart functionality. Include accordion sections for description, care instructions, and shipping info. Add RelatedProducts carousel at bottom using ProductCarousel component.

Create ImageGallery component with main image display and thumbnail navigation. Implement smooth transitions between images using fade or slide animations. Add thumbnail selection with smooth highlight animation. Support keyboard navigation and touch swipe on mobile.

Create CareIndicators component displaying water and sunlight level icons with labels. Implement entrance animations (scale, fade, or bounce) triggered on component mount or scroll. Use generated icons frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-water.dim_64x64.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-sun.dim_64x64.png with appropriate styling.

Create reusable Accordion component with smooth expand/collapse animations. Use max-height transition or Framer Motion for smooth height animation. Support multiple accordions with individual open/close states. Include animated chevron icon rotation.

requirements.summary: Build plant care guide page with blog layout and reading progress bar
acceptanceCriteria: Blog entries animate in as user scrolls
Progress bar remains sticky at top while scrolling
Progress bar accurately reflects reading position
Layout is clean and readable with good typography

file_operations.description: Create CareGuide page with blog-style layout. Display care guide articles with scroll-triggered animations using Intersection Observer. Implement ReadingProgressBar component at top. Use clean typography with appropriate line height and spacing for readability. Reference generated icon frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-growth.dim_64x64.png for article decorative elements.

Create ReadingProgressBar component that tracks scroll position and displays progress percentage. Use sticky positioning to remain at top of viewport. Calculate progress based on document height and scroll position. Animate progress bar width smoothly using CSS transitions.
Create ArticleCard component for care guide entries with scroll-triggered animation. Implement fade and slide-up animation when entering viewport using Intersection Observer.
Create static care guide articles data with titles, excerpts, content, categories, and reading time estimates.

requirements.summary: Implement slide-in cart drawer with add-to-cart animation and quantity updates
acceptanceCriteria: Cart drawer slides in smoothly from side
Add-to-cart shows item flying to cart icon
Quantity controls update with smooth transitions
Cart persists in browser storage
Empty cart state is handled gracefully

file_operations.description: Create CartDrawer component that slides in from right side using transform translateX animation. Display cart items with images, names, prices, and quantity controls. Implement smooth quantity update transitions. Show cart total. Include empty cart state with illustration and messaging. Add close button with smooth transition.

Create AddToCartAnimation component that animates product image flying from product card to cart icon in header. Use absolute positioning and CSS transforms to create parabolic motion path. Trigger animation on add-to-cart button click.

Create custom hook to manage cart state using localStorage for persistence. Provide functions for adding items, removing items, updating quantities, clearing cart, and calculating totals. Implement cart synchronization across browser tabs using storage events. Return cart items, total, and action functions.
Create CartContext to provide cart state and actions globally using React Context API. Wrap App component with CartProvider to make cart accessible throughout application.

requirements.summary: Create checkout page interface with smooth form transitions
acceptanceCriteria: Checkout form has smooth step transitions
Form fields have elegant focus states
Validation errors appear with smooth animations
Order summary updates smoothly as items change

file_operations.description: Create Checkout page with multi-step form (shipping info, payment info, review). Implement smooth transitions between steps using slide or fade animations. Display order summary sidebar that updates in real-time. Add form validation with smooth error message animations. Include checkout completion with success message.

Create CheckoutForm component with form fields for customer information. Implement elegant focus states with smooth transitions on input borders and labels. Add form validation logic with animated error messages that slide in below fields. Use controlled inputs with smooth value updates.
Create OrderSummary component displaying cart items, subtotal, shipping, and total. Implement smooth updates when quantities change using CSS transitions on number values.

requirements.summary: Build sticky navbar with blur background on scroll and animated menu
acceptanceCriteria: Navbar remains sticky at top of page
Background blurs when scrolling down
Active menu item has animated underline indicator
Mobile menu opens with fullscreen smooth animation
Navbar is fully responsive

file_operations.description: Create Navbar component with sticky positioning. Implement scroll detection to add blur background (backdrop-filter: blur()) after scrolling threshold. Add animated underline indicator for active menu item using transform and transition. Include logo, navigation links, cart icon with item count badge, and mobile menu toggle. Ensure responsive behavior with different layouts for mobile/desktop.

Create MobileMenu component that opens with fullscreen overlay animation. Implement smooth slide-in animation from top or side with backdrop fade-in. Include navigation links, close button, and smooth exit animation. Add staggered animation for menu items appearing.
Create custom hook to track scroll position and direction. Return boolean states for scroll threshold detection (e.g., scrolled past 100px) to trigger navbar style changes.

requirements.summary: Implement smooth inertia scrolling with parallax effects
acceptanceCriteria: Scrolling has natural inertia feel
Background and foreground elements move at different speeds for parallax effect
Plant images have subtle floating animation during scroll
Section transitions are smooth with no abrupt changes
Performance remains smooth during scrolling

file_operations.description: Add CSS for smooth scrolling behavior using scroll-behavior: smooth on html element. Configure scrollbar styling for premium feel. Add will-change properties for optimized performance on animated elements.

Create custom hook to calculate parallax offsets based on scroll position. Use requestAnimationFrame for smooth 60fps performance. Return transform values for different parallax speeds (background, midground, foreground layers).

Create reusable ParallaxSection component that applies parallax effects to background and foreground layers. Implement subtle floating animation for plant images during scroll using transform translateY based on scroll position. Ensure smooth transitions between sections with appropriate z-index layering.

requirements.summary: Add wishlist heart animation with smooth toggle interaction
acceptanceCriteria: Heart icon animates smoothly when clicked
Filled and unfilled states transition smoothly
Animation has a bouncy, delightful feel
Wishlist state is stored in browser

file_operations.description: Create WishlistButton component with heart icon that toggles between outlined and filled states. Implement bouncy scale animation on click using CSS keyframes or Framer Motion spring animation. Add smooth color transition between states. Include haptic-like visual feedback.
Create custom hook to manage wishlist state using localStorage. Provide functions to add/remove items from wishlist and check if item is wishlisted. Return wishlist items array and toggle function.

requirements.summary: Implement button ripple or glow effect on interaction
acceptanceCriteria: Buttons show ripple effect on click
Glow effect appears smoothly on hover
Effect is subtle and premium feeling
Works consistently across all button types

file_operations.description: Create reusable Button component with ripple effect on click. Implement ripple animation using pseudo-element that scales and fades out from click position. Add subtle glow effect on hover using box-shadow transition. Support different button variants (primary, secondary, outline) with consistent animation behavior.

Create custom hook to generate ripple effect. Calculate ripple position based on click coordinates. Return ripple state and handlers for adding/removing ripple elements with animation lifecycle management.

requirements.summary: Add smooth dropdown expansion animations
acceptanceCriteria: Dropdowns expand with smooth height transition
Options fade in with staggered timing
Close animation is equally smooth
Dropdown is accessible via keyboard

file_operations.description: Create reusable Dropdown component with smooth expand/collapse animation using max-height or Framer Motion. Implement staggered fade-in for dropdown options. Add smooth close animation that reverses expansion. Ensure keyboard accessibility with arrow key navigation, Enter to select, and Escape to close. Include proper ARIA attributes.

requirements.summary: Implement smooth page-to-page transitions between routes
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation between pages has smooth transition
No abrupt white flash or jarring reload
Exit and enter animations coordinate smoothly
Browser back/forward buttons respect transitions

file_operations.description: Wrap route components with page transition wrapper. Implement smooth fade or slide transitions between route changes using Framer Motion AnimatePresence or CSS transitions. Ensure exit animation completes before enter animation begins. Handle browser navigation (back/forward) with same smooth transitions.

Create PageTransition wrapper component that handles route transition animations. Implement coordinated exit and enter animations (fade, slide, or combination). Use route key to trigger transitions on route change. Optimize for smooth 60fps performance.

requirements.summary: Create loading animation using leaf or growing plant concept
acceptanceCriteria: Loading indicator features organic plant/leaf animation
Animation loops smoothly
Appears during navigation and async operations
Design matches overall aesthetic

file_operations.description: Create LoadingSpinner component with organic plant/leaf animation concept. Implement growing plant or rotating leaf animation using CSS keyframes or SVG animation. Ensure smooth infinite loop. Use soft green colors matching site aesthetic. Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-growth.dim_64x64.png or create custom SVG animation.
Create custom hook to manage loading state during async operations and page transitions. Return loading boolean and functions to show/hide loading indicator.

requirements.summary: Apply minimal luxury eco aesthetic with glassmorphism, soft colors, and premium polish
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses soft greens, earth tones, and beige
UI elements have glassmorphism effect with blur and transparency
Shadows are soft and subtle throughout
Grid layouts have generous whitespace
Overall feel is premium, calm, and organic
Design quality matches Apple-level polish

file_operations.description: Configure Tailwind theme with custom color palette including soft greens (e.g., #C8E6C9, #81C784), earth tones (e.g., #A1887F, #8D6E63), beige backgrounds (e.g., #F5F5DC, #FAFAF5), and complementary neutrals. Define custom shadow scales for soft, subtle shadows. Add custom spacing scale with generous whitespace values. Configure glassmorphism utilities (backdrop-blur, background opacity).

Define global design system styles including glassmorphism classes with backdrop-filter blur and semi-transparent backgrounds. Set up premium typography with appropriate font weights, line heights, and letter spacing. Define soft shadow utilities with multiple elevation levels. Add CSS custom properties for consistent design tokens (colors, spacing, radii, shadows). Ensure prefers-reduced-motion support for accessibility.

Create reusable GlassCard component with glassmorphism effect (backdrop-filter: blur, semi-transparent background, soft border). Support different variants and sizes. Use for cards, modals, and elevated UI elements throughout the application.

requirements.summary: Create static product data with comprehensive plant information
acceptanceCriteria: At least 12-15 example plants are included
Each plant has complete product information
Data structure is clean and easily editable
Images are organized and properly referenced
Multiple categories represented

file_operations.description: Expand product data array to include 12-15 plants with complete information: id, name, scientific name, description, price, images array (main + gallery), category, care requirements (waterLevel: low/medium/high, sunlightLevel: low/medium/bright, difficulty: easy/moderate/hard), size, pot type, inStock boolean, featured boolean, rating. Reference all generated product images: frontend/public/assets/generated/succulent-1.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/fiddle-leaf.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/snake-plant.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/pothos.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/peace-lily.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/rubber-plant.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/zz-plant.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/calathea.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/bird-paradise.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/string-pearls.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/aloe-vera.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/boston-fern.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/cactus-mix.dim_400x400.png. Organize in clean TypeScript interfaces for type safety.
Define TypeScript interfaces for Product, Category, CareRequirements, and related types. Ensure type safety across application.

requirements.summary: Implement frontend-only shopping cart using browser localStorage
acceptanceCriteria: Cart data persists in browser between sessions
Add, remove, and update quantity functions work correctly
Cart total calculates accurately
Cart icon shows item count badge
Cart syncs across browser tabs

file_operations.description: Ensure complete cart functionality including localStorage persistence with JSON serialization. Implement cart item management (add, remove, update quantity, clear). Calculate totals including subtotal, tax (optional), and shipping (optional). Add item count calculation for badge. Implement cross-tab synchronization using storage event listener. Handle edge cases (duplicate adds, quantity limits, removed items).

Ensure CartContext provides all cart state and actions globally. Initialize cart from localStorage on app mount. Persist cart changes to localStorage automatically. Provide clear cart API to all components.

Create CartIcon component for navbar displaying cart icon with animated item count badge. Implement badge animation when count changes (scale bounce). Add smooth pulse animation when items are added. Handle click to open CartDrawer.

requirements.summary: Ensure smooth, lightweight, and premium animations with fast performance
acceptanceCriteria: Page load time is under 3 seconds
Animations run at 60fps without jank
Motion is purposeful and not overwhelming
Users can navigate without distraction
Performance is optimized for smooth experience

file_operations.description: Add performance optimization CSS including will-change properties for animated elements, contain properties for layout optimization, and transform/opacity for GPU acceleration. Add prefers-reduced-motion media query to disable animations for accessibility. Ensure all animations use transform and opacity (GPU-accelerated) rather than layout properties.

Create animation utility functions and constants for consistent timing, easing curves, and duration values across the application. Define standard animation variants for Framer Motion. Provide performance-optimized animation configurations.

Optimize Vite build configuration for performance: enable code splitting, configure chunk size warnings, add image optimization, enable CSS minification, configure bundle analysis. Ensure fast production builds with optimized asset loading.

requirements.summary: Make website fully responsive across all devices
acceptanceCriteria: Layout adapts smoothly to all screen sizes
Touch interactions work on mobile devices
Mobile navigation is intuitive and animated
Typography scales appropriately
Images are optimized for different viewports

file_operations.description: Configure responsive breakpoints (sm: 640px, md: 768px, lg: 1024px, xl: 1280px, 2xl: 1536px). Define responsive typography scale. Configure responsive spacing and layout utilities. Add container configurations with responsive padding.

Create Layout component wrapping all pages with Navbar, main content area, and Footer. Implement responsive container widths and padding. Handle mobile vs desktop layout differences. Ensure touch-friendly spacing on mobile devices.
Create custom hook to detect screen size and breakpoints. Return boolean states for isMobile, isTablet, isDesktop. Use window.matchMedia for accurate media query detection. Update on window resize.

Add responsive typography with fluid font sizes using clamp(). Define responsive spacing utilities. Add touch-target sizing for mobile (minimum 44x44px). Configure responsive image styles with object-fit. Add mobile-specific styles for better touch interactions.
